adrFormatAddress: 387 Park Ave S 4th floor, New York, NY 10016-8810, USA

originalText.text:
I am thrilled to write a testimonial for Jessica Kaufman, the extraordinary real estate agent who makes her clients’ dreams come true. Jessica has been referring her clients to me for their home financing needs for several years now and it has become self-evident that Jessica's dedication, expertise, and unwavering commitment to her clients is truly unparalleled.

Jessica's deep knowledge of the real estate market is remarkable. She possesses an innate ability to analyze market trends and provide valuable insights that guides her clients through the entire buying process. She patiently answers seemingly endless questions and takes the time to understand her clients’ specific needs and preferences, ensuring that every property she shows is a perfect fit.

What truly sets Jessica apart is her tireless work ethic and her genuine passion for helping her clients find their ideal home. She goes above and beyond in every aspect of her clients’ home search. Jessica's warm and friendly demeanor makes the home-buying process not only efficient but enjoyable.  Her attention to detail and her proactive approach ensures there are no missed opportunities, not to mention her superior negotiation skills which helps her secure fantastic deals.

From what our mutual clients have told me, she is always accessible, responsive, and incredibly patient. They tell me that one never feels rushed or pressured, and her genuine care for her clients’ well-being is evident every step of the way.

If you're in search of a top-tier real estate agent who will go above and beyond for you, look no further than Jessica Kaufman. She's more than just another agent; she's a trusted partner in your journey to finding the perfect home.

originalText.text: Jessica is the best of the best.  Kind, personable, swift, organized and detail oriented.  Everything you want and need in cut throat NYC real estate. My budget was every ones budget, yet Jess worked with me to ensure I found a home that worked for me.  Grateful for all her help and hard work.

text.text: Jessica is the best of the best.  Kind, personable, swift, organized and detail oriented.  Everything you want and need in cut throat NYC real estate. My budget was every ones budget, yet Jess worked with me to ensure I found a home that worked for me.  Grateful for all her help and hard work.

originalText.text: This was my family’s first time navigating the New York City housing market and Jessica was a very helpful realtor. She and her partner Xavier were great at explaining the process to us, from touring apartments to completing all the documentation to putting in an offer and beyond. Xavier was very helpful on the apartment tours in pointing out drawbacks or benefits to the apartments that we might not have noticed. Jessica consistently followed up with the mortgage brokers and all other stakeholders and helped move the process along. She always kept us in the know regarding her communications with the other parties. Despite a lot of setbacks and struggles with our attorney and paperwork issues, Jessica was always advocating for us at every stage, which made a stressful process much easier. I would wholeheartedly recommend her for people who are buying property in New York, whether you are a novice or an expert; if I’m ever in the market to buy again, she will be my go-to!

originalText.text: I highly recommend Jessica - she helped me find the perfect home and guided me through a successful negotiation and complicated NYC Coop purchase process. She is an outstanding and tenacious broker who effectively represents her clients. In particular, I found she stood out from other brokers in that she actively listened to me and my feedback on various homes. She supported the decisions I made and never pushed me to compromise.  She is responsive, an excellent communicator and highly knowledgeable of the NYC market.

originalText.text: Jessica is a pleasure to work with during the purchase of my new home. She is very knowledgeable and helpful throughout the entire process. She always has my best interests in mind and makes sure I complete the required tasks on time.
